Room.Name: Z Bed Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the bedroom of Arioch & Arcana's suite.
Room.LongDescription: This fantanstic bedroom is the highlight of entire suite with a magnificent view of the Ashton Waterfalls themselves. In the center of the bedroom, a king-sized waterbed seems to ripple with the motion of long past nights. While on the ceiling, a bed-sized mirror has been strategically placed above the waterbed. The lights dim, the music begins to play softly, and your pulse quickens...
